turkish_example_sentence: Onlar yalan sözlerini söylemediklerinde, ailesi rahat uyudu.
english_example_sentence: When they did not say their false words, their family slept peacefully.
russian_example_sentence: Когда они не сказали свои ложные слова, их семья спала спокойно.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Onlar yalan sözlerini ______, ailesi rahat uyudu.
